summary: Both REQ-1 and REQ-2 appear to be fully implemented in the diff. REQ-1 is addressed via updates to frontend/index.html (title tag), Layout.tsx (navbar brand), and LoginPage.tsx (login page heading). REQ-2 is addressed via EditorPage.tsx which adds stdin state, Scanner detection logic, a highlighted input panel, and passes stdin to both Judge0 and Piston APIs.
